EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Important change to your NCS Information Evening Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
The date of your Information Evening has changed. Please see below for your updated invitation:
Date: Wednesday 13 July 2016 Time: 18:30 Address: Pleckgate High School, Pleckgate Road, Blackburn, BB1 8QA
Please let us know if you’re coming by emailing Philippa at philippa.murphy@the-challenge.org - or you can call or text them on 07469151475. Please include the name of your teenager in your reply.
We're really sorry if this has caused any inconvenience.
If you can’t make it but would still like to meet us, we’ll be holding other information evenings for NCS programmes running in different areas, or on different dates. Please contact Philippa for details.
We hope you can make it to your information evening and we look forward to seeing you.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
